description:
After the Christmas Eve concert, Touya`s father collapses, due to a longstanding condition, and is hospitalized. The next day, Yuki goes to visit him but missed Touya on his way out. Itsuki Kanzaki, after blowing off the Christmas Eve concert, is scolded, and the missing M&MM agency`s star singer, Menou Akiyama, is discovered. Eiji then stands before a painting after winning the spoils of war in his "mobilization value" bet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ve Never Been Able to Tune Properly. I Keep Thinking That It Could Sound Better.
Tuning ga Atta Tameshi ga Nai. Motto Ryoukou na Tokoro ga Aru to Omotte Shimau
チューニングが合ったためしがない. もっと良好な場所があると思ってしまう
